org.vast.util

Class SpatialExtent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vast.util.SpatialExtent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bbox

    public class SpatialExtent
extends Object

    Class for storing the definition of a spatial domain. This mainly includes enveloppe coordinates and a crs.

    Since:
    Nov 15, 2005
    Author:
    Alex Robin
